def is_specified_book(book: item):
    # Determine if a book is the specified book by checking if it has the readable property
    symbol specified_book = is_book(book) and readable(book)
    return specified_book

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists book: item : is_book(book) and is_specified_book(book):
